DeepThink_deepThink.name: DeepThink_deepThink
DeepThink_deepThink.description:
Generates a response to a query using a multi-agent implementation of the most expensive, intelligent LLM models.
Use sparingly, as instructed or when stuck on a task, as this is expensive to use. Be careful to minimize the tokens inputted.
This query runs independent of any context and understanding you currently have. All required information to answer the query must be passed in as arguments.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: Any filesystem files to include in the query

parameters.name: memoryKeys
parameters.description: Any memory keys to include in the query

parameters.name: additionalInformation
parameters.description: Any additional information to include in the query (logs, function outputs, etc)

parameters.name: queryOrRequirements
parameters.description: The query to answer or requirements to generate a response for
